safe.tip1: Whether you're a beginner or not, being underwater can be very frightening at times. Even so, it is very important that you remain calm at all times
safe.tip2: Panicking can intefere with your breathing and make you use up more of your limited air supply. As a diver, you must understand the importance of steady breathing and try you best to never panick underwater.
